website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight running shoe with breathable knit design.
pros: Cloudfoam sockliner for comfort and cushioning
Great mix of comfort, cushion and support
Good grip for running in most flat surfaces
cons: Sizing tends to run a bit big

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big dude at 6'6" 245lbs and I have to run all the time because I'm in the military. That being said. These shoes are really comfortable and give my big frame a lot of cushion and support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size small
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a full five if they fit correctly. Luckily I read product reviews first and these fit a bit large. I ordered half a size smaller so they fit perfectly on me. So if you are purchasing these, purchase a half a size lower than you normally wear and you are good to go. These are the most comfortable shoe I’ve ever put on. Will have to see how long they last though. First thoughts though, great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: gainey.jmichael

customer_reviews.title: That said they seem comfortable and I think would be suitable were they to ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed some shoes for walking/light jogging, did some research and decided on these. I have worn size 12 for 40 years and have never encountered a pair that were too large. These are, by about half a size. I thought I could make them work but am thinking I will need to sell them and move on (missed Amazon's return window by a couple days). That said they seem comfortable and I think would be suitable were they to fit better. I can recommend these with the caveat that you check the size/fit right away and decide if they are good for you.
customer_reviews.author: jc502

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.  Terrific Support and better than average cushion
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent shoes. I have been working out in these for two months. I am a bigger guy with flat feet and I can run further and work out longer in these. Normally, my feet cramp in other shoes, but not in these.
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe a half size larger than I usually wear since it only came in a medium width and I have a wide foot. It fits well and is extremely comfortable. Wearing this shoe all day is a pleasure. I was looking for an all-white shoe without a lot of frills/obnoxious logos. The three stripes are unobtrusive and this shoe filled my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Diehl

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers.They are so comfortable I have purchased purchased them 4 times including a newer similar pair that are even more comfortable than these. The memory foam is super comfortable. At first I thought they may have been too soft and it took me a day or so to really get used to them but I have not looked back since. The one problem that I have is that the soles are thin so they tend to wear out kinda fast other than that they are very light and super comfortable. Definitely worth checking them out.
customer_reviews.author: On the Radar

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I don't wear them for real running so can't judge that. I think they might be too soft for me for hard pavement running. But for everyday sneeks, they are great. The cloudfoam in the soles makes them super comfy if you're on your feet a lot and the sole isn't shaped like a truck tire tread so they don't pick up everything to step on.
customer_reviews.author: Maavalous1

customer_reviews.title: fantastic shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been. wearing Merrell running shoe for a long time. I have been wearing these for a few months now and didn't realize how great they really were until I wore my Merrells again yesterday for my run. When running in these I have had NO pain as compared to my Merrells which made my calfs super sore and gave me shin splints. I will be buying another pair of these shoes for when I wear these out.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorsN'CO

customer_reviews.title: Shoe might not be authentic adidas shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I’m thinking these shoes are counterfeit. First they did not come in the original adidas box. Then if you look at the back of the shoe, you see the right shoes does not match the left shoe. I’m guessing this is another product made in China. They do look nice from the front though.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken

customer_reviews.title: They're comfortable right out of the box and little to no ...
customer_reviews.text: These were bought to be a main running shoe for me. They're comfortable right out of the box and little to no break-in time. I like my shoes to have a little room for my toes and these shoes are slightly larger than the expected sizing. Overall it's not a big issue once you start running but when wearing casually it's noticeable. The shoes in general are comfortable. The materials are soft and the sole of the shoe has good cushioning. As long as you get the right sizing, I could recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I think they feel great! I like a lot of heal padding
customer_reviews.text: I think they feel great! I like a lot of heal padding, so more would have been better for me, but for the average person, it probably is just right!
customer_reviews.author: Shari Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable shoes. A little bit bigger than I usually had from adidas. As mentioned, shoes are comfortable but for not too long walks and probably not for running at all. Because of the foam sole, the cushioning is nice, but no support to particular part of feet. Long walks can make the feet tired and somehow painful in the are of foot arch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, comfortable, durable with a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of shoes that are very comfortable and good for walking. I walk at least 10,000 steps per day. I first wore these shoes on a trip where I walked up to 40,000 steps per day. In all cases these shoes lived up to expectations. Affordable, comfortable, durable with a great fit. Please note these shoes are not good for rain - the material is very breathable and, as a result, allows water in rather easily. Wear on hot, sunny days.
customer_reviews.author: Oxford B

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I normally love Adidas cloudfoam shoes, because they offer a lot of cushioning. I was disappointed to see that this shoe just have a flimsy insole that could easily fall out. It is not even attached to the shoe! I really enjoyed the older cloudfoams, as the quality of the insoles was significantly better. Overall a pretty good fit, though.
customer_reviews.author: Reece J. McDevitt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my new everyday shoes. They're nowhere near formal, but they are all black so I can get away with them in a business casual setting, especially when people are wearing jeans and shorts. But I can also just change into my running shorts, keep the same shoes on and do a quick post run work and it's great. Plus they just feel great. A great confirmation was going to a party and seeing a good friend with these same shoes and basically saying the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: cnglover

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: It is a really good running shoe, arrived yesterday and I used it this morning for a 2mile run...it served it's purpose, just that it was a bit small which is no fault of anyone... I just ordered 7.5 because i wanted it very tight on my feet and also there was no size 8 for the colour i wanted but I am size 8/8.5...I loved the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great for being on your feet all day.
customer_reviews.text: So far l love these shoes. Feels like I am standing on one of those pressure relieving mats that cashiers sometimes stand on. I am on my feet all day, and needed shoes that would help my feet not feel do tired at the end of the day. I have only worn them two days to work so far, but they are definitely helping.
customer_reviews.author: daw

customer_reviews.title: Cushy, comfortable, and fit as expected size wise
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic comfortable shoes, the sizing is correct. They are very comfortable for long stretches of work. If you work in a restaurant I would be careful because they are not non-slip but that is not a knock on the shoes they are not made for that . They are really comfortable during long walks, and for the minimal running I do.
customer_reviews.author: Walt Davis

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small or missed labeled, not sure
customer_reviews.text: ordered size 10 1/2 US , which is my regular size with adidas. The box is marked 10 1/2 US, but the shoes are marked 11 US. They fit as if the are size 9...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: nice comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: nice comfortable shoes, supportive on the job. Use it because at work there is a lot of black dust everywhere, so it does not show this, like shoes with white soles do. I replaced my previous sneakers that originally had traditional (white) sneaker soles that had turned black from work.
customer_reviews.author: gh_highfive

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on these. I run in them. At first, the top of my toes were rubbing, after the run, they stretched out. Easy 4 mile run, shoes are comfortable. A little more cushion than the boost foam. Great shoes, fit well, if you run, order a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable over time
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoes. I’m on my feet all day and feel that the shoes give me enough support during my work shift. I like the light feel of the shoe. The shoes seem to have gotten more comfortable since the first day of wearing them. Good shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable cloud foam soles.  Quality adidas shoes and priced well.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy cloud foam inner soles. Have several pairs of these shoes (different colors), and they really help to keep the heal of my foot more comfortable than other shoes I’ve tried. The magic of cloudfoam soles.
customer_reviews.author: Dickie Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: Grandpa looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend for work shoes. He says they are decent comfort level but not amazed. He is on his feet all day. I’m kinda bummed cause they look like total grandpa shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Perdy Juman

customer_reviews.title: After a week they feel more comfortable. I would give them 5 stars if they ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are a little more narrow than expected. After a week they feel more comfortable. I would give them 5 stars if they weren’t falling apart already. The front Addidas tag is falling off & the inside size tag has fallen off on one shoe already. First time that has ever happened to me. Shoe comfortability is great but they seem to be falling apart too soon.
customer_reviews.author: silentpro

customer_reviews.title: They are ok for the prics
customer_reviews.text: These run small. Go at least a half size up. They are extreamly light and comfy. However. I wore them every day to work and the tread wore down to nothing in a very short time. But I really enjoyed them when they were new.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Brotherton

customer_reviews.title: A very decent pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've read a lot of reviews on these shoes and decided to get a pair for work. They've been holding up well and absorbs a good deal of impact on hard concrete. I wouldn't go as far as to say they feel like walking on clouds, but they're still pretty comfortable. They're also a bit narrow, so I wouldn't recommend these for those with wide feet. These shoes get 4 stars because they're decently priced, feel good, and looks good too. I haven't had them that long so I'm not sure on the durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Cloudfoam
customer_reviews.text: God shoes, seems durable. Update: The durability is wack. I wore these and two other pair of running shoes for the past few months, yet these are the lone pair to wear out. In addition, I'm recovering from an ankle sprain as a result of wearing these while worn.
customer_reviews.author: Go

customer_reviews.title: Look amazing, too small though
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sneakers was great, but the size I ordered was too small. I ended up just returning these and getting the right size at the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E

customer_reviews.title: The other look like the sole was worn
customer_reviews.text: The shoes didn't match. One was a bit dinghy. The other look like the sole was worn. This would have been my son's 2nd pair. I was disappointed because he really likes this shoe, but was unable to wear them on his first day as a HS freshman.
customer_reviews.author: Sistah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly and comfortably, some of the best shoes I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: The Joy

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneaker, true color
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneaker, the color is accurate. I ordered 11, which is my size but it is somewhat large; there is still some room after my toes. However it is still fine
customer_reviews.author: Adamsy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, very light and looks sharp and elegant without ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, very light and looks sharp and elegant without being flashy. Perfect sizing for me. Use it mainly for walking on fairly gravelly rural roads. Satisfied with performance so far.
customer_reviews.author: GKT

customer_reviews.title: at under $50 these were a great buy. Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Cannot beat the comfort for the price. at under $50 these were a great buy. Very lightweight, I trekked over 30k steps in these one day and feet felt great afterward. So far have not encountered anyone else with these which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality and comfort they are perfect for morning walks
customer_reviews.author: William carrasquilla

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy.
customer_reviews.text: My shoe tore off after 1 month of use. I am very disappointed with the quality of this Adidas shoe. I regret spending so much on this shoe. Since it is made of light cloth, I can now see a small hole showing my socks. :( I am not at all happy. I recommend people to not be fooled like me.
customer_reviews.author: sahil

customer_reviews.title: poor support quality
customer_reviews.text: as pro it fits and feels confortable but the quality around ankle support and around laces is bad. The ankle support keeps collapsing, the right one now does not go back. after couple of 6 months the threads got loose.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I expected a better shoe. Its not really comfortable. I think a pair of shoes from walmart with a good insole is just as good but a lot less money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Soft, durable & looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these Adidas!! They are comfortable and feels light on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look sweet but not so comfortable. They dont seem to balance the foot correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable running/gym shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable running/gym shoes I've ever owned. Something about the design allows for the back of the shoe not to rub against my heal without feeling like it's falling off. I plan on buying a couple more pairs and just using them out for the next several years.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable. Perfect for light running or jogging. Also doubles great for golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Mcadoo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for these types of shoes, great for running.
customer_reviews.author: Rito Valdez

customer_reviews.title: They are not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sole feels very hard, they are not comfortable to walk.
customer_reviews.author: David Rocha Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Felt very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This fit very strangely and felt very cheaply made. Heel was super wide and the fabric on the heel started bunching up after just trying them on. I ordered 2 sizes and neither fit.
customer_reviews.author: Craigmac

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting, light weight and comfortable use
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting, light weight and comfortable use. The only thing that I would change is the tung is a little thin, requiring the proper tension on the shoe strings - too tight and you will feel it on the top of your foot.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe though
customer_reviews.text: Just a hokey fit from the ball of your foot to your toes. Nice looking shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Memmo

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I wear them to work and the gym. Great for weight lifting, cardio and just walking. I like how the mesh material is thick and sturdy, unlike most mesh style shoes that leave your feet vulnerable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the shoes made in Indonesia.
customer_reviews.text: Something is wrong with the pair of shoes I received. I have another pair, the black on black, and they are extremely comfortable. These shoes are not the same shoe, not even close. I think they are fakes. They are not soft or cushioned and the shoe materials are not the same as my first pair. If they are made in Indonesia, do not buy them.
customer_reviews.author: WRS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are great shoes they fit great and also a great price... highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my husband He really loves them and unfortunately that is all I can say. 😬
customer_reviews.author: LCB

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe. Runs a hair big in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. I usually wear a size 9 in adidas and the reviews said to go a bit bigger which I would say is inaccurate. I own 9 pairs of adidas shoes of varying styles and I ordered a 9.5. Its a tad big but not worth a return. Comfy. Light. Seem durable. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: The shoooooooes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. It actually turned out a lot better than I thought it would. Slightly bigger turn out, but I think it might fee that way because my previous shoe was worn and slightly small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love them and still use them everyday
customer_reviews.text: love them and still use them everyday, the shoe lace broke and I just replaced them. Probably going to order another when these fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reifert

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes, good for standing for long periods of time. Also would be good for running. I purchased them as part of an officials uniform so mostly I wanted a fairly stylish, comfortable all-white shoe and this fits the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same 9.5 as my others.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that it didn’t fit as well as my older pair of these sneakers which I LOVE. I’m in my feet all day and they seem comfortable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine H.

customer_reviews.title: Needed good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Need good walking shoe these shoes fit and were very comfortable. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be more comfortable, but I bought them to walk the dogs
customer_reviews.text: Could be more comfortable, but I bought them to walk the dogs, cut the grass and beat up. For the price, it's hard to beat them. They do look really cool in person too, just like the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for Teenager
customer_reviews.text: This is now my 14 year olds second pair of these. He loves them. They fit well and are comfortable for daily wear. He uses them for all cross training events and are fashionable enough to wear out too.
customer_reviews.author: Oz Girl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Comes bigger than the average size 13 shoe. The only shoe I've ordered through amazon that didn't fit correctly. The cushions make it somewhat comfortable to wear, unfortunately do not want to hassle with sending it back so will have to stick it out until I can afford to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: R Smith

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price it’s very comfortable fits great and can be used as a going out shoe with jeans or a running shoe.I like it a lot I’m not an expert in sneakers by any means but it feels authentic and very well made
customer_reviews.author: Duare Ori

customer_reviews.title: but some of the padding in the heel got messed up early and are less comfortable now.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, but some of the padding in the heel got messed up early and are less comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great looking
customer_reviews.text: The receiver loved them! Supportive and comfortable. My comment was sufficient but i am required to add 13 more words.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob R

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but long
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. They are a tad on the long side, but otherwise fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Paradis

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable shoes. I am a 10.5 and buy size 11 for running shoes and this one fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Julio J. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe; fit as expected and comfortable. Would purchase again. Used for trip to Europe and used as a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G

customer_reviews.title: True to adidas
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to adidas size, I am a 10 in these despite my wide foot, and they fit perfectly. I am always a 10 or 10.5 in Adidas runners, usually a 10. Very good traction and breathe well. Very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: m mueller

customer_reviews.title: Love The Shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came a bigger than expected but nothing too severe. I would order a half-size down next time. The quality is phenomenal, they are extremely comfortable and they push off with every step. The grip on the bottom is designed really well and does the job on cement, rails, and tile flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Haeven

customer_reviews.title: Cushiony but tough!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable (after "break-in") especially since I work in a tough working environment. Exactly what i needed!
customer_reviews.author: Richie C.

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. They are extremely comfortable with their "Cloudfoam" technology, but the fit was a little larger than what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Winn's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bough them for my guy's birthday & he loves them. Stylish, comfy & they breathe well!
customer_reviews.author: K. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing shoe and it is very comfortable, fit just right. I was so happy they were selling 12s because not a lot of online stores do. It is hard to find shoes my size but I love it! Got to keep them clean.
customer_reviews.author: TaWanna Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Asolutely only for very narrow footed people. Not for any kind of slightly wide feet people or more wide.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Great walking shoe. Been wearing daily for a month and still look good. No wrinkles. Average width like most adidas. Great shoe
customer_reviews.author: john bieloh

customer_reviews.title: nice overall. gave it to my dad since it ...
customer_reviews.text: runs lil big. nice overall. gave it to my dad since it won't fit me.
customer_reviews.author: Uugii

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but the quality can be lots better!
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow for my feet! Also, it sprouted holes in just the 6th month of using it. Looks nice though.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Love love! Wore it for vacation knowing I'll do a lot of walking and my feet and legs did not get fatigued. Very comfortable and for someone like me who has a hipe problem, these shoes were worth it.
customer_reviews.author: K.D Ko

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply made. You could see the glue on all sides . Does not appear to be original. Be warned
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: It's been a couple months since I bought it. I honestly thought it would be a knock off. It fits just right and it helps that it's also comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Broken right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the ankle piece of the right shoe totally smash in and unwearable. Not sure if it was the manufacturer or the seller that caused the damaged but was junk right out of the box. Will need to return.
customer_reviews.author: NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort of these shoes as well as all of the other Adidas cloudfoam shoes that I have. These are the most comfortable shoes that I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are good looking and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: C Ham

customer_reviews.title: free
customer_reviews.text: the price was right I got them with points. I have these in black so I knew I would like them in grey, same size same fit.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but I feel like the back of the shoe is a LITTLE bit short. I always feel like my heel is going to come out while I'm running.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bolden

customer_reviews.title: Floats like a butterfly
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfy, my foot just melts into the soft padding in the sole. Almost feels like your wearing nothing on your feet at all when you are running.
customer_reviews.author: ThatTallKid

customer_reviews.title: great sneakers, i want a pair in every color
customer_reviews.text: great sneakers, i want a pair in every color... not the longest lasting, but at this price, i don't care... cute and comfy
customer_reviews.author: pat shepard

customer_reviews.title: Comfy kinda good looking too
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy for hours of work but they do slip a bit in a kitchen not a problem though since they weren't meant for kitchen work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have been a lifelong fan of New Balance but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a lifelong fan of New Balance but these shoes have become my newest favorite--especially for the price point. They took a couple of days to break in but after that they fit just right. I will definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: The cloudfoam is comfortable. I'm on my feet all day for work, but these feel good.
customer_reviews.author: JASON D.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Cloudfoam is supportive but has a perfect amount of cushioning - feel great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pair
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have an amazing insole and are very versatile and still remain fashionable. They are well made and true to size and provide ample support.
customer_reviews.author: Merely A Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. I have had Adidas running shoes in ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. I have had Adidas running shoes in the past. I purchased these for casual wear but they fit nice and feel light and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Robhart

customer_reviews.title: They seemed nice though.
customer_reviews.text: They were too big for me. They seemed nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Overall great shoe and really like it
customer_reviews.text: I shoulda ordered true to size. Overall great shoe and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Peeters

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great look
customer_reviews.text: Fit great fewl really nice. Will have to wait to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Sbly

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great. I invested in theese shoes because I'm on ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great. I invested in theese shoes because I'm on my feet a lot. They are very comfortable. They also do run small. I bought some shoe stretchers and stretched them out and now they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Feels comfortable, I'm excited to try it and use for ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels comfortable, I'm excited to try it and use for work tomorrow. I little bit big for my feet. Even though i normally wear size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My son normally wears a 14, the 14's were too big. So I ordered him the 13 and they fit perfect. He said that they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Reich

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Comfortable, look great, and the top of the heel is easy to grab when putting them on.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Terrible not even a month in and there is already a hole in these. Cheap fabric I literally only wear these on runs and I run a clay track. They are comfortable and supportive but cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Jglow

product_meta.title: adidas NEO Men's Cloudfoam Race Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Give yourself a style makeover. These shoes have a clean look inspired by modern runners. Mesh keeps them cool. Cloudfoam keeps them light and comfy.
feature_bullets: Features of this item include: Memory Foam, Running
